nodes.text: Algarian was a planet in the Mid Rim's Dufilvian sector. It was raided by the Galactic Empire, which was attempting to defeat all Alliance support on-planet.

Algarian was well known for its huge and complex governing bureaucracy. No other information was publicly available without submission of a Form AA-23-7022 and a 150 credit processing fee to the Algarian Bureau of Planetary Information and Tourism.
